root.title: 1 Karban inscriptions
root.place: The inscription is on left coast on river Karban near the mouth in confluence to Katun river in front of village Kujus of Chemal region.
root.general: The inscriptions is on rock ledge among numerous petroglyphs.
root.description: The vertical line consists of 17 characters.
root.investigation: The inscription was found by Elin and Soyenov in 1988 519, the same year it was investigated by Matochkin 520. The inscription is mentioned in scientific researches of Klyashtornyi, Kyzlasov 522, Kocheev 523. The text was investigated by Klyashtornyi and Matochkin 521.
